game.name: Vytal Tactics
game.shortDescription: A real-time top down tactics game that rewards spacing, clever item use and team building. Vytal needs help, so form a strong team, level up your heroes and choose powerful artifacts to take out rounds of enemies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A real-time top down tactics game that rewards spacing, clever item use and team building. Vytal needs help, so form a strong team, level up your heroes and choose powerful artifacts to take out rounds of enemies.
